1.content:
[Number of chapter processed : 122 / 5752] (2019/11/17)
(The encyclopedia will be updated every 100 chapters processed in my database)

This page is the homepage of this Encyclopedia around the "The dictaphone" interactive story.

From here, you can access to different informations, sorted by thematics.

Choice 1: List of characters
To get access to the complete list of named characters in the story.

Choice 2: List of chapters
To get access to the list of story's chapters, gathered by criterias (i.e: list of chapters by a certain tag).

Choice 3: List of fetishes
To get access to the list and informations of all fetishes present inside the +5000 chapters of the story.

Choice 4: About the authors
Generic informations about several authors of "The dictaphone", including myself.

Choice 5: Help / About this encyclopedia
To give you help if you're having trouble navigating this encyclopedia.

~ LeFrenchFox ~
1.title: The dictaphone - Encyclopedia

11.content:
These pages intended to give generic as well as more detailed informations about all named characters of "The dictaphone".

To each named character of the story, a bio page / chapter will be dedicated, describing the character's most noticeable physical trait (gender, age, height, body type, bra size) and personality.

Notes about this page:
- Are listed here all characters that have at least a known name or are a clearly identified relative to named characters.
(examples : "Angie Marsh" or "Angie's mother")
- Are provided in each character's page informations that are known and mostly admitted as caracteristic to the character.

The following list of character indicates if a character is a main character or a secondary character.

_________________________________________
Main characters : Characters that have their own dedicated storylines and chapters right from the start (ex: Angie, Lucy or Vanessa). Every existing storyline originated from one of them.
A character being a Main character doesn't mean they can't appear on other storylines. In fact, many main characters interact with eachother on different storyline and many main characters are secondary characters of other storyline.

Secondary characters : Characters that don't have their own storylines not from the start. (ex: Wendy Barnes, Anita, Mark, Jill, Peter, Blair, Drake ...) These are characters that are introduced on storylines only from a certain point, on some other character's storylines.
From then, secondary characters can become the new main character of a storyline on further chapters.
Like Main characters, Secondary characters can appear and be introduced on multiple storylines that aren't always necessarly linked amongst themselves.
_________________________________________


Main characters :

Adam Kaiser
Alex
Angie Marsh  
Ignacio
Jasmine
Josh
Ken
Kimberly
Lucy McMillan
Mia
Taylor
Vanessa Barnes
Vanessa Barnes [prequel version]

To access to a character's bio page and informations, simply click on her/his name above or follow the choices under this page.
11.title: List of characters

choices: List of Angie Marsh's introduction chapter(s)
List of Angie Marsh's specific fetish chapters
List of related characters and her relation to them
111.content:
First Name: Angie
Last Name: Marsh

Gender: Female

Age: 16
Height: 5'0" / 1,52m
Hair color : Brown

Breasts size: An A-cup at best.

Sexual orientation: heterosexual

Appearance:

Small, skinny, brown hair, with no breast to speak of.
Oftenly described as cute despite her clear lack of curves.
Wears glasses. Has no ass as well and has still a pretty undevelopped childish body despite her puberty.

Personality:

Angie is a shy and pretty insecure teenage girl, but also very smart (a top grade student of her high school, if not the most brillant).
Angie is a pretty nerdy girl, and has good wits as well as a genuinely good and kind nature, sometime to the point of being gullible and naive, despite her intelligence. A trait that sometimes lead her to put her trust on the wrong people, who might abuse her naivety.

Angie has a great lack of self-confidence. This and her insecurity are mostly due to her frail, small and childish-looking physical appearance.
Angie has a huge complex of inferiority because of this.

Despite probably being one of the most kinded and good-hearted characters in "The dictaphone" stories,
Angie isn't completely impervious to corruption, as she could become, on several cases, a pretty evil character, if not the most evil character, of some storylines.
This is sometime results of her life frustrations or sudden unexpected burst of anger, as well as simply bad luck and random events...

Angie is shy and has a great difficulty to socialize even with people her age.
In consequence she has mostly only one real noticeable friend : Lucy McMillan.

Though, Angie Marsh's shy, insecure and underestimating herself attitude should not be mistaken as total innocence,
as Angie, despite all this, has lot of dreams and fantasies and has been shown, on many case, to be capable of very perverse thoughts and actions, particularly when she let her fantasies speaking, and can become a particularly naughty, perverse and even obscene character on several storylines.

Fetishes this character undergoes:

- Breast expansion
- Ass expansion
- Muscle growth
- Giantess
- Shrinking
- Slutification / Bimboization
- Corruption
- Lips growth
- Pussy growth
- Futanari / Cock growth
- Femdom

1351.content:
Breast expansion:

"Breast expansion fetishism is a sexual fetish characterized by pronounced sexual fantasies involving a female whose breasts enlarge, either gradually or suddenly, sometimes to gargantuan proportions."
(source: wipipedia.org  )


Breast expansion, in simple words, is the fetish about breasts growing bigger/larger.


In this Encyclopedia, a chapter will be qualified as featuring "breast expansion"
if it features at least one scene of breasts getting enlarged, independently of the original size of the breasts (from flat or already big) and/or the growth process (medical, magical, by dictaphone implication directly or not).

To be qualified as "breast expansion", breasts must grow specifically, in particular and getting bigger in proportion of the body, not as a inherent result of a global growth (like with "giantess" fetish).
Breasts must grow bigger in comparison to the character's body proportion.

For example: Character A is growing from 5 feet tall to 10 feet tall, or more.
Because the character's body is bigger overall, the breasts will be ultimately bigger as well, in consequence of the overall growth, but the breasts themselves aren't bigger in regards of the character overall size.
The character A, despite being 2 times bigger, is still the same breast cup size.

That's why breasts growing bigger because of "gts" (giantess) scene, girl character growing bigger overall, aren't qualified as "breast expansion", unless it clearly specifies that the breasts are growing bigger, independently of the body's overall growth.

* * *

14.title: About the authors

choices: Helping Form: Fill yourself informations about your chapter
Ask your questions or give your suggestions [n°1]
Ask your questions or give your suggestions [n°2]
Ask your questions or give your suggestions [n°3]
15.content:
Hi !

I'm LeFrenchFox, creator of this "encyclopedia" project around Wokod's interactive story "The Dictaphone".

This project is meant to progress and evolve more or less like a Wikipedia page would.

As in, this whole item in its current state (by the time you're reading this) might be actually pretty empty of actual data and informations.

"The dictaphone" having been supplied by many new chapters, one after another, during all these years,
it is now being a HUGE story with a number of chapters that is counted being SEVERAL THOUSANDS.

But it IS because the story is so huge that I decided to create this encyclopedia, as it becomes more and more complicated to get an overall view to all what this amazing item initiated by Wokod can offer. Particularly for newcomer who only recently discover the story.

But... Because it is indeed a massive interactive story (probably one of the biggest of this website, if not the biggest), it will take time for me, the insane idiot who dare to throw himself into such project, to compute everything out of it.

How exactly are you proceeding ?:

I could be gathering informations from every single chapter of The Dictaphone and filling this encyclopedia accordingly by reading with close scrutiny every single one of these 5000+ chapters.
In some way, I will.
If I want to attempt to gather informations out of people's writing, I'll have to read myself as I can't really rely on automatic process or A.I to "guess" informations out of chapters by text-automatic-analyze. I don't have such sufficient intelligent A.I in my hands, and i'm no Google either, lol.

Though, i'll be helping myself by the use of a personal database in MySQL on which i'll record on my side every chapter people have written on the dictaphone with informations on (author of the chapter, path of the chapter, parent chapter, etc...)

If everything goes well, this database i'm making will makes thing pretty easier for me to sort data and then providing you here with informations you might use then to find what you want around "The Dictaphone".

Because of this roadmap, "The dictaphone - Encyclopedia" might be in a stasis phase for a while, as long as it'll take me to design and put in place the Database to help me fill this item.

I want to help you. What can I do ?:

If you want to help me filling this encyclopedia, unfortunately, I can't really think of much things you can do without some efforts on your side.
Though, if you're one author of "The dictaphone", you can help in different ways :

- You haven't your personal "author page" written here yet :

Don't hesitate to send me everything you could tell about yourself, as an author, here on this encyclopedia, that I could add on the "authors" page. Of course, it's up to you to provide more or less personal info or insight about you as one of the author of "The dictaphone". I won't force any author to actually give any info about themselves if they don't want to. Nor will I display info I know myself about you, unless these are publically displayed info (on your own profile page for example).
So don't hesitate to contact me about any of these. (to add, correct or delete data that can end of the "authors" page and on your own "author" page)

- You've written a chapter on "The dictaphone" :

You can help me proceeding informations on the chapter you just wrote, by using a form I'll eventually give you after this chapter that you can fill accordingly to what your chapter contains and is about.
Filling this form properly will save me time when i'll end up analyzing your chapter as you'll have already giving me info about it in the form, instead of having to find it myself.
(see choice chapter below)

About permissions and copyrights :

This encyclopedia project isn't coming out of the blue.
I've already discussed with Wokod, creator of "The dictaphone", himself about it and about my will to put something like that to help reader navigating around his creation and he accepted the idea.
Though, if at any time, Wokod doesn't give me his consent anymore, i will lock this encyclopedia away from anyone to see.

As well, this encyclopedia doesn't have the intent to literally copy/paste the "The dictaphone" authors' original content nor it has the objective of claiming ownership on authors' original content. This encyclopedia will content informations about "The dictaphone"'s content, not taking its content itself.

This being said, don't hesitate if you have any questions, to use the "choice" system below to ask me question (about and around this encyclopedia, of course). If only one chapters is remaining below to ask a question or suggest something, please add a whole new set of empty choices chapters, so that people can continue asking questions or suggesting things after you.

Kisses and bro fists
~ LeFrenchFox ~

155.title: More questions/suggestions ...

info.brief_description: Everything you need to know about the popular fetish interactive story by Wokod.
info.description:
This interactive story is not a story.
This interactive story is intended to be a collection of data around the popular interactive story "The dictaphone" available here on writing.com.

Created in 2012 by Wokod, and still getting frequent updates to this day, "The dictaphone" is an erotic and fetish interactive story narrating the stories of characters who, one day, come upon a mysterious object in the shape of a dictaphone that makes everything it records becoming true.

The characters realized quite quickly the both amazing and terrifying power of this mysterious Dictaphone as it allows them to not only change themselves and their lives, but also the very fabric of Reality itself, both past, present and future.

The ensues, for the involved characters, the realization of any of their wildest and craziest dreams and fantasy...

...

Accessible on writing.com at this address : https://www.writing.com/main/interact/item_id/1897904-The-dictaphone
"The dictaphone" is the most plentiful erotic interactive story of the website, with more than 5700 chapters by the time this text is written.

That's why after a little discussion with Wokod, author and creator of "The dictaphone", I decided to create this encyclopedia, which will sort informations about the story's characters, the many storylines, the written chapters and the available fetish there, to help people who want to get easier access to these informations in the extremely vast universe of this interactive story.

To achieve this, I'll offer you to get access to different aspects of the whole "The dictaphone" interactive story and its content, like informations on all the characters or to get access to list of chapters featuring particular kinks and fetish (for example).

Considering the massive quantity of data to collect, this encyclopedia will surely not contains everything that it should, particularly on its early age.
I plan to provide a system, using the "add chapter" here, to allow anybody to make suggestion about a new entry on this Encyclopedia.


I hope this item will be helpful to anyone seeking informations, whether you're an active author of "The dictaphone" or just a fan reader.


Thanks to you all !


~ LeFrenchFox ~
Artist, author and fan of "The dictaphone"





[IMPORTANT NOTE: This encyclopedia is a project on the long run and will be constantly a WORK IN PROGRESS little Bible of "The dictaphone". Which means it might be lacking many entry or information. Gathering every data on "The dictaphone" and its more than 5000 chapters is a long and partially manual process and not easy goal. So be aware that this encyclopedia might not be considered as a 100% correct or reliable source]
